Html:
Hello,

Does anyone tested PHPWord_0.6.2_Beta with Open-Office.

For me Open Office Writer (3.2.0) hangs - just exit's while trying to open any generated documents by PHPWord.

Also tried empty documents and example files - the same problem, while Microsoft Word opens correctly.

Thanks.

I had a similar issue: OO Writer 3.2 would crash every time I tried to open a PHPWord .docx. I sent an error report to OO, and they suggested I uninstall OO 3.2 and install OO 3.4_dev. Okay, OO Writer now opens the .docx but the tables on the page are not formatted correctly. It's better than crashing though.
